forms

Class TaskForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • forms.ModelForm<Task>
      • forms.TaskForm

  • public final class TaskForm
extends ModelForm<Task>
    TaskForm is responsible for process of tasks creation. instance field is reference to Task associated with this form (in case its null new object is created).
    Author:
    laiqu
    See Also:
    ModelForm

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Validates task. Duration can not be 0 and title can not be empty. Title and comment should be null but this actually should never happen.
        Specified by:
        isValid in class ModelForm<Task>
        Returns:
        boolean true if task is valid.
        See Also:
        ModelForm.getErrorsDisplay()

      • save

        public Task save()
          throws ValidationException
        Because we should'nt pass JList to forms, it simply validates the task and returns it so controller can do whatever he wants with it.
        Overrides:
        save in class ModelForm<Task>
        Returns:
        created task
        Throws:
        ValidationException
        See Also:
        ModelForm.isValid()
